definition: Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]/Son Goku, the main character in Dragon Ball 七龍珠|七龙珠[Qi1 long2 zhu1]

sentences.english: Learn more through with Sun Wukong Xianqi that simply.
sentences.chinese: 学千术跟孙悟空吹仙气一样那么简单。

sentences.english: The features of the image of Monkey King are a combination of fiction and fact.
sentences.chinese: 孙悟空形象的特点是亦真亦幻，幻中寓真。

sentences.english: He is Sun Wukong, the Great Sage Equaling Heaven, who made havoc in Heaven.
sentences.chinese: 就是那大闹天宫的齐天大圣孙悟空。

sentences.english: In comparison, the Monkey King is a lone ranger.
sentences.chinese: 相比较而言，孙悟空是一个孤胆英雄。

sentences.english: In the Chinese classic Journey to the West, who does Sun Wukong meet in his first challenge?
sentences.chinese: 在《西游记》里，孙悟空斩妖除魔的第一关遇到谁？

sentences.english: The Tang Dynasty the monk misunderstands Sun Wu empty excessive to kill however innocent, chase its a division door.
sentences.chinese: 唐僧却误会孙悟空滥杀无辜，将其逐出师门。

sentences.english: In her blog, Tsuji noted that she was and continues to be a fan of Dragon Ball's Goku character.
sentences.chinese: 在她的博客中写道她将继续作七龙珠中孙悟空的粉丝。

sentences.english: After the havoc in heaven monkey king is captured and sealed in a magic furnace.
sentences.chinese: 大闹天宫后，孙悟空遭擒拿被打入八卦炉冶炼。

sentences.english: The Monkey King cannot jump out of Buddha's palm.
sentences.chinese: 孙悟空跳不出如来佛的手心。

sentences.english: To directly contact Sun Wukong, or Monkey Sun, of course you should go to Huaguo Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 要与孙悟空零距离接触，自然要去花果山。

sentences.english: I like the most in the big brother Sun Wukong.
sentences.chinese: 在其中我最喜欢的是大师兄孙悟空。

sentences.english: Hence Princess Iron Fan hated Monkey and refused to lend the fan to him.
sentences.chinese: 因此铁扇公主恨孙悟空，拒绝借扇他。

sentences.english: This mantra, Sun Wukong never dare not listen to his words.
sentences.chinese: 咒，从此孙悟空再也不敢不听唐僧的话了。

sentences.english: Some time ago, Red Boy had tried to eat the Tang Priest and Monkey had subdued him.
sentences.chinese: 前一段时间，红孩儿吃了唐僧和孙悟空制服了他。

sentences.english: Sun Wukong, still in the guise of an overseas Chinese, Mr. Sun, prepared to return to his birthplace.
sentences.chinese: 孙悟空的化身华侨孙先生准备回到他出生之地花果山。

definition: Zhu Bajie, character in Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记, with pig-like characteristics and armed with a muckrake/Pigsy in Arthur Waley's translation
Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers from the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 You2 Ji4]
Xuanzang (602-664) Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator, who traveled to India 629-645
Great Sage the Equal of Heaven, self-proclaimed title of the Monkey King Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1] in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
tathagata (Buddha's name for himself, having many layers of meaning - Sanskrit: thus gone, having been Brahman, gone to the absolute etc)
Monkey Wreaks Havoc in Heaven, story about the Monkey King Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1] from the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记
Tripitaka (602-664), Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator who traveled to India 629-645/same as 玄奘
Great-Sage Sun/Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1]
Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1], the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
